creator: ghorvath@imagemedical.com
text:
Builtin dialog always displays port 443 and external (exec:) program gets port
443 - no matter of the value in 'Virtualhost' directive.

<VirtualHost _default_:8443>
...
</VirtualHost>

You failed to set the ServerName directive inside the <VirtualHost > section.

closing.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
ghorvath@imagemedical.com
text:
<IfDefine SSL>
Listen 0.0.0.0:8443
AddType application/x-x509-ca-cert .crt
AddType application/x-pkcs7-crl    .crl
SSLPassPhraseDialog  exec:/home/medsrv/var/openssl/bin/ssl_pp
SSLSessionCache         dbm:/home/medsrv/var/log/apache/ssl_scache
SSLSessionCacheTimeout  300
<VirtualHost _default_:8443>
DocumentRoot "/home/medsrv/htdocs"
ServerName osdev.eradimagemedical.hu
ServerAdmin medsrv@osdev.eradimagemedical.hu
ErrorLog /home/medsrv/var/log/apache/error_log
TransferLog /home/medsrv/var/log/apache/access_log
SSLEngine on
SSLCipherSuite ALL:!aNULL:!ADH:!eNULL:!LOW!EXP:RC4+RSA:+HIGH:+MEDIUM
SSLProtocol -ALL +SSLv3 +TLSv1
SSLCertificateFile /home/medsrv/var/openssl/certs/default.pem
SSLCertificateKeyFile /home/medsrv/var/openssl/privkey.pem
SSLCACertificatePath /home/medsrv/var/openssl/CA
<Files ~ "\.(cgi|shtml|phtml|php3?)$">
    SSLOptions +StdEnvVars
</Files>
<Directory "/home/medsrv/htdocs">
    SSLOptions +StdEnvVars
</Directory>
SetEnvIf User-Agent ".*MSIE.*" \
         nokeepalive ssl-unclean-shutdown \
         downgrade-1.0 force-response-1.0
CustomLog /home/medsrv/var/log/apache/ssl_request_log \
          "%t %h %{SSL_PROTOCOL}x %{SSL_CIPHER}x \"%r\" %b"

</VirtualHost>                                  

</IfDefine>

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
He should have said "you failed to PROPERLY set the ServerName directive".  Tack
the port on the end as documented here:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/mod/core.html#servername

Joshua.
